description:
TL;DR: Protect your privacy on up to 10 devices with a lifetime subscription to FastestVPN, on sale for $29.97 (reg. $360) until July 21 at 11:59 p.m. PT. 

VPNs aren’t new, but finding one that’s reliable, fast, works on 10 devices, and doesn’t charge you every month might be. FastestVPN is a reliable VPN service with a lifetime subscription for 10 devices, and the one-time fee has been marked down from $360 to $29.97, but that price won’t last much longer. 

What sets
title: Protect 10 devices for life with this $30 VPN
